titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to temporarily suspend the duties on jacquard cards jacquard heads.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1989, the duty on jacquard cards and jacquard heads for power-driven weaving machines.
